title: Construction Indonesia 2025 Expands Focus on Building Materials and Technology
body: Construction Indonesia 2025, marking its 25th anniversary, will be held from September 10-13, 2025, at Jakarta International Expo, Kemayoran, featuring expanded segments on building materials, technology, and smart building solutions. The event aims to foster collaboration among industry players and promote sustainable practices, with significant participation from international exhibitors and strategic partnerships with organizations like Green Product Council Indonesia and Indonesia Construction & Architecture Network.
